nodes.text: Cell block 2018 was a prison cell block in the Ultraviolent Offenders Containment section of the Maximum Security Section, a sector of the Belsavis prison facility on the planet Belsavis. The Gen'Dai Agrular the Mad was one of the prisoners incarcerated in block 2018, and during the invasion of Belsavis in the Galactic War, Buzz and Squarg, two subordinates of the crime lord Ivory, freed Agrular but the three were killed by a smuggler before they could escape the cell block.
Cell block 2018 is a class-restricted area on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where the Smuggler class mission "Aggravated Assault" occurs.
